delete_account.title: Delete account
delete_account.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all associated data will also be deleted as well

trip.share: Check out my trip {{name}} created on TripViewer, starting on {{start}} and ending on {{end}}

delete.title: Delete trip
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the trip {{name}}? This action cannot be undone

basic_information.subtitle: Add the main information about your trip here

visibility.subtitle: Determine who can view and edit your trip
visibility.public: Anyone with the link can view your trip
visibility.editors: Allow other users to edit your trip

customization.subtitle: Give your trip a personal touch
customization.colors: Choose your trip's theme and colors
customization.links: Add useful links to your trip

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.subtitle: Manage your expenses before and during the trip
expenses.public: Make your expenses visible to others
expenses.private: Secure your expenses with a PIN

pin.title: Access PIN
pin.request: To access the expenses, enter the PIN set for this trip

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.subtitle: Add your main travel legs: departure, during the trip, and return

accommodation.title: Accommodations
accommodation.subtitle: Add where you'll be staying during your trip

itinerary.title: Itinerary
itinerary.subtitle: Add your day-to-day schedule here
itinerary.instructions: Select a date to view the itinerary
itinerary.set_title: Set the title of the itinerary to "{{title}}"

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Upload relevant photos for your trip, such as maps, confirmations, event times, and more

destination.title: Destinations
destination.subtitle: What to do during your trip? Where to eat? What to visit?
destination.share: Check out the destination {{name}} I created on TripViewer
destination.all_used: Cannot add new destinations. All destinations registered in this account have already been used
destination.basic_information: Add the main information about your destination here

delete.title: Delete destination
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the destination {{name}}? This action cannot be undone

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Places that serve full meals. Perfect for lunch and dinner. Some may only open at night.

snacks.title: Snacks
snacks.description: Quick-bite spots. Great for a snack, or light meal. Includes cafés, bakeries, and fast food places.

nightlife.title: Nightlife
nightlife.description: Bars, pubs, karaoke spots, clubs, or anything focused on drinks and entertainment.

tourism.title: Tourism
tourism.description: Tourist attractions including neighborhoods, monuments, museums, squares, viewpoints, exhibitions, and more.

shopping.title: Shopping
shopping.description: Malls, supermarkets, outlets, clothing stores, electronics shops. Everything shopping-related.

map.title: Map
map.description: Interactive Google Map with highlights of the city: Restaurants, Snacks, Nightlife, Tourism, and Shopping
map.instructions: Create a map for free at

lineup.title: Lineup
lineup.description: Event lineup — may include times, stages, artists, notes, and links to artists' Spotify profiles.

tourismAndShopping.title: Tourism & Shopping
tourismAndShopping.description: A mix of tourist spots and shops: neighborhoods, monuments, museums, malls, and more.

food.title: Food & Drinks
food.description: All kinds of places to eat and drink: restaurants, fast food, cafés, bars, pubs, and more.

listing.title: Destination lists
listing.share: Check out the destination list {{name}} I created on TripViewer
listing.basic_information: Add the main information about your destination list here

last_update.title: Show last update date
last_update.description: Shows the date when the listing or any destination was last updated

listing.description_placeholder: List of things to do in the best international destinations I've visited recently

visibility.subtitle: Determine who can view and edit your destination list
visibility.public: Anyone with the link can view your destination list
visibility.editors: Allow other users to edit your destination list

customization.subtitle: Give your destination list a personal touch
customization.colors: Choose your destination list's theme and colors
customization.links: Add useful links to your destination list

messages.long_load: Loading is taking longer than expected
messages.share: Check out what I've created on TripViewer

errors.unknown: An unexpected error prevented the page from loading
errors.unauthenticated: Couldn't load the document because the user is not logged in
errors.no_upload_permission: You don't have permission to upload files
errors.module_not_active: Cannot load the page. The module {{module}} is not active
errors.no_data_on_module: No data found for the module {{module}}
errors.loading_timeout: The request took too long to respond. Please try again later

too_early.title: You're a bit early! 😅
too_early.message: Hi there! TripViewer isn't accepting new sign-ups just yet. We're working hard to launch our first public version. Stay tuned! 🚀

access_denied.title: Access Denied 🚫
access_denied.message: You don't have permission to access this page. Please check your credentials or contact the system administrator

get.no_code: There's no valid code in the URL.

save.no_new_data: No new data was detected in the document
save.unknown: An error occurred while checking the document for changes
save.incomplete: The document was partially saved. Some changes may not have been applied.

images.title: Custom images
images.subtitle: Add a wallpaper and a logo

themes.light_and_dark: Show in Light and Dark mode

image.title: Image
image.quantity_limit: You can add up to 5 images
